languages.text: "У Футфола уже был суровый господин, Каллигос Винтерскейл. И мы с благодарностью принимали его строгую защиту... пока он был рядом. Теперь мы нуждаемся в покровителе иного склада. Иначе зачем бы нам навлекать на себя гнев почтенного Винтерскейла?"

traits.locale_text: "У Футфола уже был суровый господин, Каллигос Винтерскейл. И мы с благодарностью принимали его строгую защиту... пока он был рядом. Теперь мы нуждаемся в покровителе иного склада. Иначе зачем бы нам навлекать на себя гнев почтенного Винтерскейла?"

languages.text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"
languages.original_text: "У Футфола уже был суровый господин, Каллигос Винтерскейл. И мы с благодарностью принимали его строгую защиту... пока он был рядом. Теперь мы нуждаемся в покровителе иного склада. Иначе зачем бы нам навлекать на себя гнев почтенного Винтерскейла?"

traits.locale_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before, Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fiber. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

"Footfall has had a harsh master before, Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fiber. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

"Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

"Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

"Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

languages.text: 「フットフォールには以前にも厳しい主人がいた…カリゴス・ウィンタースケールだ。そして私達はその厳重な庇護をありがたく受け入れた…あの方がいてくれた間はね。今は別の筋の支援者を必要としている。別の理由で、敬愛するウィンタースケールの怒りを買う必要はないだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールには以前にも厳しい主人がいた…カリゴス・ウィンタースケールだ。そして私達はその厳重な庇護をありがたく受け入れた…あの方がいてくれた間はね。今は別の筋の支援者を必要としている。別の理由で、敬愛するウィンタースケールの怒りを買う必要はないだろう？」

languages.text: “落脚港之前的主人也同样严酷。那个人叫做卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，我们曾满怀感激地接受了他的严密庇护……一直到他离开这里为止。不过现在，我们需要一位与他不同的赞助人，否则我们有什么理由，非要惹怒尊敬的温特斯凯尔不可呢？”
languages.original_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: “落脚港之前的主人也同样严酷。那个人叫做卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，我们曾满怀感激地接受了他的严密庇护……一直到他离开这里为止。不过现在，我们需要一位与他不同的赞助人，否则我们有什么理由，非要惹怒尊敬的温特斯凯尔不可呢？”

languages.text: «Paso ya conoce el patrocinio de un señor estricto, Calligos Winterscale. Y de buena gana aceptamos su ayuda... mientras estuvo entre nosotros. Ahora necesitamos a alguien de un talante distinto. ¿Por qué si no íbamos a provocar la ira del admirable Winterscale?».
languages.original_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: «Paso ya conoce el patrocinio de un señor estricto, Calligos Winterscale. Y de buena gana aceptamos su ayuda... mientras estuvo entre nosotros. Ahora necesitamos a alguien de un talante distinto. ¿Por qué si no íbamos a provocar la ira del admirable Winterscale?».

languages.text: « Castel connaît déjà bien ce genre de méthodes, ayant eu pour maître Calligos Winterscale, et nous avons accepté cette stricte protection de bon cœur... tant qu'il a été présent. Aujourd'hui, nous sommes à la recherche d'un autre genre de protecteur. Sinon, à quoi bon nous attirer la colère de l'honorable Winterscale ? »
languages.original_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: « Castel connaît déjà bien ce genre de méthodes, ayant eu pour maître Calligos Winterscale, et nous avons accepté cette stricte protection de bon cœur... tant qu'il a été présent. Aujourd'hui, nous sommes à la recherche d'un autre genre de protecteur. Sinon, à quoi bon nous attirer la colère de l'honorable Winterscale ? »

languages.text: "Footfall hatte schon einen strengen Herren – Calligos Winterzunder. Und wir haben seinen strengen Schutz dankbar akzeptiert ... solange er hier war. Jetzt brauchen wir einen Beschützer von anderer Art. Warum sonst sollten wir den Zorn des geschätzten Winterzunder riskieren?"
languages.original_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: "Footfall hatte schon einen strengen Herren – Calligos Winterzunder. Und wir haben seinen strengen Schutz dankbar akzeptiert ... solange er hier war. Jetzt brauchen wir einen Beschützer von anderer Art. Warum sonst sollten wir den Zorn des geschätzten Winterzunder riskieren?"

languages.text: "Binliman'ın daha önce de aman bilmez bir efendisi oldu: Calligos Winterscale. Katı korumasını da minnetle kabul ettik, tabii etrafta olduğu sürece. Artık farklı kumaşa sahip bir hamiye ihtiyacımız var. Yoksa saygıdeğer Winterscale'in gazabını neden üstümüze çekelim?"
languages.original_text: "Footfall has had a harsh master before — Calligos Winterscale. And we gratefully accepted his strict protection... for as long as he was around. Now we're in need of a patron of a different fibre. Why else would we incur the esteemed Winterscale's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın daha önce de haşin bir efendisi oldu: Calligos Winterscale. Katı korumasını da minnetle kabul ettik, tabii etrafta olduğu sürece. Şu an farklı kumaşa sahip bir destekçiye ihtiyacımız var. Yoksa neden saygıdeğer Winterscale'in gazabını üstümüze çekelim?"
